Title: La seconda volta
Writer: Francesco Bruni, Mimmo Calopresti, Heidrun Schleef
Actors: Francesca Antonelli, Nicoletta Bertorelli, Valeria Bruni Tedeschi, Carola Campana
Plot: Professor Alberto Sajevo sees a woman walking in downtown Turin and starts following her for days; he finally meets her and they start talking, but they both give fake names. She is not the common secretary she pretends to be, but ex-terrorist Lisa Venturi who's currently in jail for having severely wounded Sajevo fifteen years before; he will finally and dramatically reveal himself.
